name: Nanoholdings
description: VC Firm focused on energy efficency
overview:
Nanoholdings, a diversified investment firm that invests in and commercializes breakthrough materials science energy-related discoveries in partnership with world-class universities and their leading scientists.

Nanoholdings invest in early stage energy generation, storage and conservation technology through a range of application specific entities focused on developing new nanotechnology-based solutions to improve the efficiency of the global energy market at all points in the supply chain, from generation and transmission to storage and conservation.

Nanoholdings unique approach is to empower the world’s premier materials science and nano technology scientists allowing them to focus on developing disruptive technologies that will be both profitable and make the world a better place. Molecular level innovation creating new nano materials will re-engineering the current energy supply chain with new ways to efficiently generate, store, and transport energy.
